meanings.definition: Too great to be calculated or estimated.
meanings.sent1: The number of stars in the sky is incalculable.
meanings.sent2: The impact of her kindness on others is truly incalculable.
meanings.sent3: Trying to count all the grains of sand on the beach would be an incalculable task.
meanings.sent4: The love between a parent and child is as incalculable as the depths of the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The amount of joy a simple smile can bring is truly incalculable.

meanings.sent1: The outcome of the game was incalculable until the final moments.
meanings.sent2: The weather in this region is known for its incalculable changes.
meanings.sent3: Trying to guess what a cat will do next is an incalculable challenge.
meanings.sent4: The twists and turns of life make it an incalculable journey.
meanings.sent5: The path to success is often filled with incalculable obstacles.
